# Hello World

This is a sample blog post to demonstrate **Markdown** rendering.

## Features

- GFM Support
- Syntax Highlighting
- Mermaid Diagrams

### Code Example

```typescript
const greeting = "Hello World";
console.log(greeting);
```

### Mermaid Diagram

```mermaid
graph TD;
    A-->B;
    A-->C;
    B-->D;
    C-->D;
```
